about_the_game:
Mine Battles is a game universe with a story. The Discovery of Mesopotamia series is in the rpg category and will be available as a singleplayer. In our game, which is played with a third-person camera perspective, there are sword-shield, bow-arrow and magic abilities. According to the level of our character, he can improve his status and unlock new abilities. In this series, limited to 30 Levels, our character embarks on a utopian adventure by learning special abilities and producing special weapons. In this series, which deals with the discovery of the planet named Mesopotamia, our player tries to solve the secret of the planet by fighting with creatures and performing tasks.

Mine Battles Online, the latest series of the game, will be related to this series and is planned to be published after 2025 as an MMORPG.

Some of the systems you can use in this series are as follows;
Level Jumping System, Fighting creatures and gaining loot, craft system, trading system, quest system, castle siege, exploration, collecting, cooking, chemistry, fishing

short_description: Mine Battles - Discovery of Mezopotamia is an action and adventure game with a single player game mode. Discovery of Mezophotamia, the second game in the Mine Battles series, is a single player game with a TPS-style perspective. Fight by doing missions and solve the secret of Mesopotamia.
